Class ValidationError

ValidationError is an error thrown when validation fails.

It's designed to support showing validation errors for user input.

member

message the errors as a string as formatted by validationSummary

    • ValidationError

Properties

errors

errors: Record<string, string>
  • Defined in sqljoy-runtime/src/validation.ts:23

An object mapping the invalid parameter name to an error. If there is more than one error per parameter, only the first is recorded.

nonFieldErrors

nonFieldErrors: string[]
  • Defined in sqljoy-runtime/src/validation.ts:27

An array of errors that don't pertain to any individual parameter.
